title.rendered: Join Us at the NAR Conference – #NARdiGras!

content.rendered:
Only 3 days left until NARdiGras! Are you ready?

Here at Market Leader, preparations have been underway for several months—and we’re exceptionally excited for this year’s event.

Why? Well, we always look forward to seeing our customers and feeling the industry buzz from being surrounded by exciting ideas and opportunities in real estate. This year, we’re extra excited because we’re doing something new and different at our booth— and we’ve been keeping it under wraps until today.

At the NAR conference this year we’re going to have guest speakers and mini real estate training sessions at a theater, right at our booth all day, every day of the conference.

We’ve invited some of the biggest brains in real estate to share their information and ideas at these training sessions, including Ben Kinney of ActiveRain and Gahlord Dewald of Inman News. We’ll also have speakers from DocuSign, Kodak and many more.

You can pick up the full schedule at our booth: #439

It’s all part of our culture and 10+ year history of sharing best practices and encouraging innovation in the real estate industry. Everyone is welcome to join… agent or broker, east coast or west coast, current customers or new customers. You can stay as long as you like—there’s always a lot to learn!

At this conference, we’ll also offer some of the best deals you’ll see all year on our industry-leading real estate leads products. Our current customers are strongly encouraged to come by our booth, learn a few new ideas, and share the story of how Market Leader has improved the success of their business. We’d love to hear your story.

We’ll see you at Booth #439 in New Orleans in just a few short days!
